Fulfillment Attributes

Fulfillment attributes is a subset of attributes which will not be disclosed to Rokt's services before a user accepts an offer. They were designed to share user's personally identifiable information (PII) with Rokt only in case of a user consent. PII is often required by Rokt to fulfill campaing goals. A good example would be user's email which is considered PII but is essential for Rokt to be able to deliver an email campaign.

Please note, that on the initiation of the integration hashed (SHA-256) values will be exposed to Rokt's backend services. Disclosing hashed values allows Rokt's systems to deliver on some of the expected functionalities, for example supress showing offers to a returning user while still respecting privacy concerns.

rokt.onLoaded(function(rokt) {
  rokt.setAttributes({
    amount: '42.00',
    currency: 'USD',
    quantity: '1',
  });

  rokt.setFulfillmentAttributes({
    email: 'jane.doe@emaildomain.com',
  });
});

See Rokt.setFulfillmentAttributes for more details on setting fulfillment attributes
